headline: Gasoline production cut at Marathon Galveston Bay Texas refinery, sources say
summary: Gasoline production was cutback on Saturday at Marathon Petroleum's 631,000barrel-per-day Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City, Texasdue to a fire on the residual hydrotreater, said people...
